long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimplyDark, the Chrome extension that transforms you homepage to a relaxing dark sky!
Enjoy the relaxing vibe of the night sky!

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to install the "SimplyDark" Extension, to set the Chrome™ New Tab search to Yahoo, and to our Terms of Use - https://admin.pesology.com/pesology/terms/, and Privacy Policy -https://admin.pesology.com/pesology/privacy/.
